mapper.select: SELECT pouch_img,member_no,pouch_no,pouch_name,num FROM (SELECT pouch_img,member_no,pouch_no,pouch_name,rownum as num FROM (SELECT pouch_img,member_no,pouch_no,pouch_name FROM pouch ORDER BY pouch_no DESC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT a. pouch_img,a.member_no,a.pouch_no,a.pouch_name,a.pouch_score,a.pouch_like,a.regdate,a.pouch_content, b.skin_type, b.id, b.nickname, b.profile_img FROM pouch a ,member b WHERE a.member_no = b.member_no AND a.pouch_no = #{pouch_no}
SELECT COUNT(a.pouch_no) FROM pouch a LEFT JOIN member b ON a.member_no=b.member_no WHERE upper(${fs}) LIKE '%'||upper(#{ss})||'%'
SELECT a.pouch_no,a.pouch_name,a.regdate,a.pouch_content,a.pouch_like,a.pouch_img,b.nickname FROM pouch a,member b WHERE a.member_no = b.member_no AND upper(${fs}) LIKE '%'||upper(#{ss})||'%'
SELECT a.*, b.profile_img, b.id, b.sex, b.skin_type, b.age_group FROM pouch_reply a, member b WHERE a.member_no = b.member_no AND a.pouch_no = #{pouch_no} ORDER BY a.regdate
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pouch_reply VALUES( (SELECT NVL(MAX(pouch_reply_no)+1,1) FROM pouch_reply WHERE member_no = #{member_no}), #{pouch_no}, #{content}, SYSDATE, #{member_no2}, #{pouch_rate} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM pouch_reply WHERE member_no = #{member_no} AND pouch_reply_no = #{pouch_reply_no}
mapper.select: SELECT product_no FROM pouch_in_product where pouch_no = #{member_pouch_no}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM pouch_in_product WHERE product_no = #{product_no} AND pouch_no = #{pouch_no}
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET pouch_jjim_count=pouch_jjim_count-1 WHERE product_no=#{pno}
UPDATE product SET POUCH_JJIM_COUNT = POUCH_JJIM_COUNT+1 WHERE product_no = #{pno}
UPDATE pouch SET pouch_like = pouch_like+1 WHERE pouch_no = #{pouch_no}
UPDATE pouch SET pouch_like = pouch_like-1 WHERE pouch_no = #{pouch_no}
